p: In this present study, diabetes was induced with a combination of high fat diet and a low dose of streptozotocin (STZ) and the effect of the C. auriculata root extracts was evaluated. The change in the body weight of mice of different groups is presented in Figure 4 . The mice were fed with the high-fat diet for 11 weeks; thus, a considerable increase in body weight was observed among the high-fat-diet-fed mice as compared to the control group. After the induction of diabetes, the weight of mice in the diabetic group significantly reduced, whereas the treatment with the C. auriculata root extract could help in regaining the weight much better than the metformin-treated group.
